text: We have been with Mindspace since Dec and my kid has been enjoying the program and the food! We also have seen improvements in her studies and overall homework discipline since we changed her to mindspace.

I would highly recommend MS WCP. Top Management, Ernest, is a like-minded father just like the rest of us and is sincere and honest. The Centre Director, Ms Jas, is compassionate and able to manage the teachers and centre well. Teachers, Ms Siti and Ms Husna, are capable and passionate in teaching. I see improvement in my child's both academic and holistic development. Its a good learning and safe space for kids to be in after school. Dont need additional tuition. ðŸ™‚ Even the cleaning auntie has amazing personality and kind to the kids. Always tirelessly cleaning the centre. Very dedicated. The centre is very clean. Good hygiene level.

Started w Mindspace WCP and its been wonderful since day-1. Friendly, attentive teachers and staff; Clean and conducive environment; and best of all my son get the help (and focus) he needs to complete his homework everyday!

It has been a positive experience with the team at Mindspace West Coast Plaza.

Regular updates and arrangement of sessions to prepare parents, hand in hand to positively engage our child!

Best Staff award for Mr Ernest @ West Coast Plaza, always so approachable and so helpful!
